page.title: 05TRANSPORT 1
page.content: At Maypole there is a small{AIRFIELD with a grass landing strip running through the crops. A helicopter and 7 light aircraft are kept there in hangers. The field developed to answer the need of the amateur flyers and owners. The{AIR MECHANIC}came here in the first days of the airstrip as an owner/flyer. Today he has a small business here. The work consists of rebuilding veteran biplanes, {DH.TIGERMOTHS}some aircraft are assembled from old parts the others first flew over 30 years ago. All the materials used are very costly and the standard of the work most exacting for safety reasons. The mechanic still gets airborne and doing the job of his dreams. the business 'must' succeed and he works long hours 7 days a week. The{VILLAGERS} have learnt to tolerate the airfield
